DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal evaluate predictive accuracy measure autoregulatory adequacy derive CVInsight compare measure recognize hypotensive event hemodialysis..
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Cardiovascular Stress Patients Hemodialysis Study II
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims follow : 1 . Assess accuracy new rule set CVInsight® predict intradialytic hypotensive episode . 2 . Assess comparative predictive accuracy CVInsight® measure regard intradialytic hypotensive event . 3 . Assess estimate dry weight goal monitor post-dialytic vascular refill use CVInsight® measure . 4 . Assess hemodialysis ( HD ) -induced myocardial injury monitoring occurrence frequency arrhythmia level cardiac Troponin T .
DOC.criteria: Eligibility shall consist follow : Age ≥ 20 year old Speaks understand English , Spanish Chinese Provides Informed Consent Patients 20 % intradialytic hypotensive event last two month . Exclusion criterion group : Unstable hemodialysis patient per judgment clinician prior start treatment Patients unable blood pressure cuff measure upper arm Inability wear monitor forehead Patients treat sodium ultrafiltration profile patient 's nephrologist unwilling alter study treatment Patients unwilling shave anterior chest Patients active infection upper chest wall tissue . Patients deep brain stimulator , may disrupt quality ECG data . Patients unwilling take short shower versus bath 7 day period . Patients require intradialytic testing ( ie transonic ) monitor treatment .
